author: slava77
body:
I was testing https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/23768 on non-AVX machine and saw crashes due to invalid instructions.
In the specific case, it was a call to ```vpxor``` in ```mxnet::op::AdaptiveAvgPoolParam::__MANAGER__() ()```.
After recompiling with ```USE_F16C=0```, the same place in the code is using a simple ```pxor```.
title: suppress usage of AVX instructions in mxnet
